Bundle.Entry: mandatory value
the value must be a valid boolean
the value must be a valid date
the value must be a valid number
the value must be a valid float
the value must be a valid timestamp
the value must be a valid time
the value must be a valid integer
the value must be a positive number
the value must be a negative number
the value must be greater than or equal to ${value}
the value must be greater than ${value}
the value must be less than or equal to ${value}
the value must be smaller than ${value}
the value must be one of: ${values}
the entered value length must be ${length} characters
the value length must be at least ${length} characters
the value length must be at least ${length} characters
the value must have at most ${digits} fraction digits
the value must have at most ${digits} total digits
the value must have the format ${pattern}
